publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-50.1 Bill Wilson: The Single Transferable Vote—As an amendment to motion (S3M-50) in the name of Kenneth Gibson, leave out "lottery" and insert "the party submitting their names." Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
